events.title: Youth Camp — March Break Week 1
events.description: Ages 8–14. Week 1 of the March Break volleyball camp. Skills, drills, and fun in a supportive environment. $300/week.

events.title: Youth Camp — March Break Week 2
events.description: Ages 8–14. Week 2 of the March Break volleyball camp. Continue building skills with BVA certified coaches. $300/week.

events.title: Annual Corporate Volleyball Tournament
events.description: BVA's annual corporate tournament brings together Bermuda's business community for a fun day of volleyball competition. All skill levels welcome. Great networking and team-building opportunity.

events.title: Summer Beach League — Season Opens
events.meta: Horseshoe Bay Beach & Elbow Beach · Mon–Thu
events.description: The 2026 Summer Beach League season kicks off. Monday through Thursday play at two iconic Bermuda beach locations. 2v2 and 4v4 divisions for recreational and competitive teams.

events.title: BVA Beach Classic
events.description: BVA's premier beach volleyball tournament at the world-famous Horseshoe Bay. Doubles format featuring Bermuda's top beach volleyball talent. Spectators welcome.

events.title: Bermuda Open
events.description: The Bermuda Open welcomes teams from across the Caribbean and North America to compete at one of the world's most beautiful volleyball venues. 4v4 beach format, international competitors.

events.title: Winter Indoor League — Season Opens
events.description: The Winter Indoor League season begins at CedarBridge Academy. Competitive and recreational 6v6 divisions. Keep your volleyball fitness through the winter months. $150/team.
